metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8485 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The setup_group function in bfd/elf.c in libbfd in GNU binutils 2.24 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted section group headers in an ELF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8485` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-multiarch - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-source - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-static - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24-5ubuntu3.1').
